text: @realDonaldTrump Oh, sad little #Bunkerbaby. Did you know that #COVID19 cases are rising? That over 110,000 Americans have died due to your incompetence? That 40 million Americans are unemployed? Did you know you have an actual JOB? And it's NOT to waste taxpayer time and money on your campaign.
